file_content.text: The boss is out. Job's over, get offworld... ah!
You killed them. You killed my mercenaries.
You have ruined me again!
I don't like my identity being made public. Who knows the truth?
Anyone else know about me?
I told no one. But the one who told me--the one called Hunter--I think he will tell many more.
The Empire wanted Nem'ro, so you became the villain. It was convenient. It wasn't fair.
I'm sorry for what happened.
It was everything I earned in two centuries. I would have ruled Jiguuna well.
You get to leave here, but in the future, you will help me--provide me with resources and information.
You want to live? Serve me.
I will... do what I must. You will hear from me.
Leave, Fa'athra. Don't come to me again.
Our fight is over.
You're sending me away...? Ha!
The luck of my clan holds true. I restart once again....
For what it's worth, I don't enjoy this.
It isn't personal. [Kill him]
You should've tempered your ambitions, found yourself a casino on Nar Shaddaa. Now you leave me no choice.
Tough break. [Kill him]
Someone really wants you dead to go digging up your past. Trying to keep you from the Shining Man... heh.
You're gonna bleed out a gut.
The sparks in your body sing mournfully.
Don't move. You behave, we'll find you a nice Imperial medic to treat you....
You kept your cover until the end. You did well.
Your wounds are fatal. How does that make you feel?
I'm not making it home. But at least I'll die an Imperial... instead of a blasted alien.
I mean to finish this mission, but I need your help.
Tell me what you found out.
Hold on. I'll find you a medpac and a speeder to Voss-Ka.
I won't let you die.
I bleed human blood. You'd just blow my cover and I'd die anyway.
If you have dying words, now's the time.
Better make this quick.
If you were human, you'd have learned manners by now.
Suppose Intelligence doesn't teach bedside manner.
I was studying the Nightmare Lands when I was captured. The Chamber of Ashes... it's where the Shining Man supposedly found his scroll of prophecy.
The only maps... ah! The only maps of the Nightmare Lands are locked in the capitol building. Carvings, tapestries... you'll never find your way without them.
Follow the carvings to the Chamber of Ashes. From there, find the Shining Man's hideout.
Understood.
If there's anything I can do, just name it.
Any last requests?
Make the last five years matter.
You did your duty. No one can ask for more.
You've served the Empire well.
My Voss family. They'll get you inside. Get you to the maps.
Never thought I'd die here....
